title: Snowdown sweets not showing up in shop?
body: Yeah.. can't seem to find them anywhere. I bought them the other days.

replies.body: You can only buy them on weekends (though this weekend it was more like Sun/Mon than Sat/Sun, that my or may not change next weekend).
Ahhh that makes a lot more sense, thanks.
ohhh ok, thank you for the help man!
Same they are gone for me today too
I have the same problem here, I don't know what's going on.
